WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Request_Leave_of_Absence_Event.description: The worker for the Leave Request Event.

Leave_Request_Data.description: An "ID" value for the Leave of Absence Request record that is to be added. This "ID" can be used to lookup Leave of Absence Request records to return employee from.
A boolean value to determine if this web service request is a correction or add operation.

Leave_Request_Data.description: Position Reference for the given Employee

validation.validation: Position Reference is required.
The Position Reference is not allowed for the provided Leave of Absence Type Reference.

Position is not valid for this Worker as of the effective date.
Worker: [worker]
Position: [position]
Date: [date]

Leave_Request_Data.description: The date (YYYY-MM-DD) value for the first day of the leave.

validation.validation: First Day of Leave must be on or after the worker's hire date.

Leave_Request_Data.description: The date (YYYY-MM-DD) value for the last day of work.

validation.validation: Last Day of Work must be on or prior to the First Day of Leave.

Leave_Request_Data.description: The date (YYYY-MM-DD) value for the estimated last day of leave.

validation.validation: Estimated Last Day of Leave must be on or after the First Day of Leave.
Verify that the First Day of Leave and Estimated Last Day of Leave are correct. The estimated length of a leave must be less than 50 years.

validation.validation: The Dependent provided is not associated to the Worker requesting Leave
Dependent is configured as a required field for the selected leave type.

Leave_Request_Data.description: The last date for which the Canadian employee is paid as specified on this leave request transaction for the employee.  If a position based leave, the date is the last date the position is paid. This field is specific to Canadian employment.

validation.validation: Last Date for Which Paid must be on or after the employee's Hire Date.
Last Date for Which Paid must be on or after the Last Day of Work.
Last Date for Which Paid is required for Canadian employees.

Leave_Request_Data.description: Date Baby Arrived Home From Hospital
Location for a worker on leave at another academic institution.
Used to record the percentage of working time for which the employee is on leave. Used when a worker is on partial leaves.
Used to record the date of the Sunday prior to the expected due date.
Used to record the value of an override to entitlement.
Used to record date of recall used in Canada ROE report.
